epic.title: CCEM - Claude Code Environment Manager
epic.description:
# CCEM - Claude Code Environment Manager

## Overview
Comprehensive TUI-based configuration management system for Claude Code v2.0.10 with fork point discovery, chat history analysis, and schema-based architecture.

## Strategic Goals
1. **TDD-First Development**: 95%+ test coverage with Jest + TypeScript + ink-testing-library
2. **TUI Excellence**: Rich terminal interface with Ink + React
3. **Schema-First Design**: Zod validation with UUID-based relationships
4. **Fork Discovery**: Chat history analysis and git worktree detection
5. **Documentation**: TSDoc standard with automated generation
6. **Semantic Versioning**: TypeScript-specific SemVer compliance

## Technical Stack
- **Language**: TypeScript 5.3+ (strict mode)
- **Runtime**: Node.js 18+
- **TUI**: Ink 4+ with React 18
- **Testing**: Jest 29+ with ts-jest + ink-testing-library
- **Validation**: Zod 3.22+
- **Documentation**: TSDoc + TypeDoc
- **Build**: esbuild/tsup

## Implementation Methodology
**Test-Driven Development** (Uncle Bob's Three Rules):
1. Write failing test first (RED)
2. Write minimum code to pass (GREEN)
3. Refactor while maintaining tests (REFACTOR)

## Development Phases

### Phase 1: Foundation (TDD Setup) - 4-6 hours
- Project Setup & Test Infrastructure
- Schema Validation System
- TypeScript Configuration & Linting
- Documentation Standards Setup

### Phase 2: Core TUI (TDD Implementation) - 8-10 hours
- Menu Navigation System
- Configuration File Parser
- State Management System
- File Operations Manager

### Phase 3: Merge System (TDD + Integration) - 6-8 hours
- Merge Strategy Engine
- Conflict Detection System
- Backup & Restore System
- Security Audit Hooks

### Phase 4: Fork Discovery (Advanced TDD) - 8-10 hours
- Chat History Analyzer
- Git Worktree Detector
- Context Extraction Engine
- Conversation-to-Code Mapper

### Phase 5: Quality & Deployment - 4-6 hours
- Comprehensive Test Suite (95%+ coverage)
- TSDoc Documentation Complete
- CI/CD Pipeline (GitHub Actions)
- NPM Package Publishing

## Success Criteria
- ✅ 95% test coverage (enforced by CI)
- ✅ All features documented with TSDoc
- ✅ SemVer compliance for all releases
- ✅ Functional TUI accessible via `/ccem` command
- ✅ Fork point discovery operational
- ✅ Complete training data preservation

## Repository Structure
**GitHub Project**: idfw (containing idfw, idfwu, ccem repos)
**Primary Repo**: https://github.com/peguesj/ccem (to be created)

## Related Projects
- **IDFWU**: Integration of IDFW and Dev Sentinel
- **Linear Project**: IDFWU - IDEA Framework Unified (4d649a6501f7)
- **Team**: Pegues Innovations

## Estimated Timeline
**With Parallel Agent Execution**: 30-40 hours across 3-5 agents
